result.answer_text:
As of the most recent data available, Luxembourg has a higher GDP per capita compared to the United States.

According to the World Bank, Luxembourg's GDP per capita was approximately $131,300 in 2022, whereas the United States had a GDP per capita of approximately $76,300 in the same year.

Thus, Luxembourg's GDP per capita is higher by about $55,000.
